description:
To participate you have to do the following:

Make a post with:
• our logo
• tag @iotamons
• write your Soonaverse name in the post

On Soonaverse:
• apply for the 50% DISCOUNT badge
• enter the link to your twitter post in the application box

A maximum of 50 people will receive a spot! Challenge ends on 16th of December.
name: 50% DISCOUNT
